name: CreateOrgConnection
description:
Creates a new organization connection in Datadog.

Use this tool to create a connection between the current organization and a target organization within Datadog. Ideal for linking organizational resources and sharing data across teams.

parameters.name: connection_types
parameters.description: List of connection types to establish between the organizations.

value_schema.description: List of connection types to establish.

parameters.name: organization_connection_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of the organization connection. Must be 'org_connection'.

parameters.name: target_org_uuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the target organization to connect to.

parameters.name: target_org_name
parameters.description: The name of the target organization to connect with.

parameters.name: organization_relationship_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of the organization relationship. Must be 'orgs'.

value_schema.description: The type of the organization relationship.
